title: Unidentified NFL team proposes tush push ban
description: An NFL team has submitted a rule proposal to ban the "tush push" quarterback sneak, Troy Vincent, the NFL's executive vice president of football operations, told reporters at the scouting combine Monday.
author: ESPN

title: Pass rusher Carter won't work out at combine
description: Penn State defensive end/outside linebacker Abdul Carter will not work out at the NFL's scouting combine this week because of a shoulder injury.
author: Jeff Legwold

title: Galatasaray accuse Mourinho of making 'racist statements'
description: Galatasaray said they would "initiate criminal proceedings" against Fenerbahce manager Jose Mourinho after claiming he made "racist statements" following the teams' 0-0 draw on Monday.

title: Crumbling fortresses - why are teams struggling to win at home?
description: The proportion of home wins in the Premier League is at its lowest outside of the Covid era - but why?

title: 26-and-under power rankings: Soto, Tatis among young superstars elevating their clubs
description: We're getting closer to the teams best positioned for the future as our ranking of every MLB team's 26-and-under stars covers Nos. 15-11.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: TGL: LA Golf Club, Tony Finau rally from 4-0 deficit to claim victory, playoff berth
description: In the first of two Monday night matches, LA Golf Club thundered past New York GC to claim victory.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Ferguson named Rangers head coach until end of season
description: Rangers have named former captain Barry Ferguson as their new head coach until the end of the season.

title: Ref Watch: Why Everton penalty should have stood vs Man Utd
description: Everton should have kept a last-minute penalty for Matthijs de Ligt's shirt pull on Ashley Young during the 2-2 draw with Manchester United, according to former Premier League referee Dermot Gallagher.
